# **Hello there, Welcome!**

I am a Doctoral Candidate at **Department of Earth & Environment** at **Boston University**.\
\
I investigate **large-scale ocean atmosphere interactions associated with Kuroshio Extension variations and their linkages with marine heatwaves**, advised by [**Prof. Bruce Anderson**](https://www.bu.edu/earth/profiles/bruce-anderson/).\

### **Recent Highlights**

#### Fall 23'

Check out our [**newly published article**](https://www.nature.com/articles/s43247-023-01010-1) in ***Communications Earth & Environment***.

I was an **Earth System Science Intern (NESSI)** at **National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR)**.
